sections.heading: of advertising outside of right-of-way; agreements authorized; commercial and industrial zones; provisions
sections.text: (1) In order that this state may qualify for the payments authorized in 23 U.S.C. 131(c) and (e), and to comply with the provisions of 23 U.S.C. 131 as revised and amended on October 22, 1965,

sections.heading: 39-1320 to 39-1320.11 constitute a reasonable and valid exercise of the police power which bears a substantial relation to the public health, safety, and general welfare, and are constitutional
sections.text: State v. Mayhew Products Corp., 204 Neb. 266, 281 N.W.2d 783 (1979).
